MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA21 postcode area of Saltcoats, affecting properties in Caledonia Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08:41am. Our engineers have arrivedon site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:40am on the 9th of April 2021
